"A.P.239/5/10/10:00": "I know I said this earlier, but it seems that this planet's acting as a seal on [Apprentice]'s power."
"...How does someone like you know that?"
"I'm a Dark Falz, of course! ...Formerly. And by that fact, Yu-chan should know too!"
"Don't group me together with you."
"So cooold! You're no fun... Whatever, to each her own, I suppose."
"That mining machine there is what's suppressing [Apprentice]'s power, right? All this to keep it sealed there..."
"Yet, I don't know anything about that machine... nor anything about this planet."
"This really is an unfamiliar time and place to me."
"And here... No, not just here, but... Photoners no longer exist in this world."
"We really were wiped out, weren't we? ...We're really gone, aren't we?"
"Hey, are you..."
"Hey, do you think that mining machine's working properly?"
"Well, it should be working! It's smoking like that and all..."
"But its power is diminishing. Is it reacting to something? Like some sort of catalyst?"
"H-Hey! Where are you going?"
"What are you going to do, Yucreta?"
"We can't leave it like that... I'm still linked to it."
"Hey, wait up! Since we're going ahead, should we go up to the corrupted area?"
"...Corrupted area. In this unstable place? I guess."
"This's [Profound Darkness] feeding grounds. [Profound Darkness] bait's grow here. But..."
"...Hmmm. But, this isn't the place where [Profound Darkness] is resurrected?"
"Then... There's no use for this corrupted zone. It's completely left suspended. ...I wonder if that's it."
"Just this place, we don't get used to. Only time flows differently here."
"...Haha. Just like me now."
"Yu-chan..."
"You can feel something from ahead, right? If you're investigating, then be quick."
"Don't turn eyes away"
"Side Story - Meaning of This Place"
